entry.string: Your validation code has been sent again to the email address you have registered.
Your account has not yet been activated. You need to finish these final steps in order to complete your account activation.
To continue, please follow this link.
Please enter your username and validation code below
entry.translation: Geef alstublieft uw gebruikersnaam en validatiecode beneden

entry.string: If you did not receive your validation code, we will try to resend it now.
entry.translation: Als u uw validatie code niet hebt ontvangen, zullen wij trachten het nu opnieuw te versturen.
